remarks: Lemma for ~ smumul .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2016.)
statement:
smumullem.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ZZ ) $.
smumullem.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ZZ ) $.
smumullem.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
smumullem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( bits ` A ) i^i ( 0 ..^ N ) ) smul ( bits ` B ) ) = ( bits ` ( ( A mod ( 2 ^ N ) ) x. B ) ) ) $.
